definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The Recreational and Diversional Therapy Unit is subvented by the Community Chest.
sentences.chinese: 康樂治療小組是公益金資助的其中一項服務。

sentences.english: The legal public welfare fund is used for the collective welfare of the company's employees.
sentences.chinese: 保險公司的法定公益金用於本公司職工的集體福利。

sentences.english: If they answer the chest's exercise correctly, the treasure is theirs.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們回答公益金的正確行使，珍惜的是他們。

sentences.english: Becomes a member of the Community Chest.

definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
special fund/money allocated for a particular purpose
to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions
lottery run by China Welfare Lottery, a government agency that uses a portion of the money from ticket sales to fund welfare projects (abbr. for 福利彩票[fu2 li4 cai3 piao4])
sports lottery (sports betting run by a government agency, China Sports Lottery) (abbr. for 體育彩票|体育彩票[ti3 yu4 cai3 piao4])
